name: OpenAI DALL·E / GPT-Image
tagline: A crisp all-rounder for safe, high-quality generations.
tip: Works best with explicit composition + lighting notes.
sweetSpot: Reliable all-rounder for clean, on-brief image generation.
visualStyles: Photoreal and product-style visuals; strong clarity and polish.

name: Stability AI / Stable Diffusion
tagline: Maximum control for tinkerers and pipelines.
tip: Great when you need seeds/negative prompts and repeatability.
sweetSpot: Tinker-friendly powerhouse for custom workflows and control.
visualStyles: Huge range from photo to stylised; great for guided looks.

name: Leonardo AI
tagline: Fast iteration and asset creation for creatives.
tip: Use variants to explore style quickly.
sweetSpot: Creator-focused tool for fast iteration and asset-style outputs.
visualStyles: Game/concept vibes; punchy stylised art and variants.

name: I23RF AI Generator
tagline: Quick concepts without heavy setup.
tip: Best for rapid brainstorming rather than final art.
sweetSpot: Simple generator for quick concepts without heavy setup.
visualStyles: General-purpose looks; best for fast idea sketches.

name: Artistly
tagline: Easy marketing-friendly image generation.
tip: Use short prompts with a clear subject and style.
sweetSpot: Easy creative generation aimed at quick marketing visuals.

name: Adobe Firefly
tagline: Business-friendly generation for design pipelines.
tip: Great when you need clean, brand-safe compositions.
sweetSpot: Business-friendly generator designed for design pipelines.

name: Midjourney
tagline: Best-in-class aesthetics and stylised imagery.
tip: Use style + camera notes; iterate with variations.
sweetSpot: Best-in-class aesthetics for striking concept imagery.

name: Canva Text-to-Image
tagline: Quick images that drop straight into designs.
tip: Best used inside Canva with your brand kit.
sweetSpot: Quick images that slot straight into Canva designs.
visualStyles: Social graphics, simple illustrations, brand assets.

name: Bing Image Creator
tagline: Fast, accessible generation for everyday needs.
tip: Use clear nouns + style; avoid over-long prompts.
sweetSpot: Fast, accessible image generation for everyday needs.

name: Ideogram
tagline: The go-to for readable text inside images.
tip: Use short phrases; keep typography explicit.
sweetSpot: The go-to when you need readable text in images.

name: Picsart
tagline: Mobile-first creation with quick edits.
tip: Great for social formats and fast post-processing.
sweetSpot: Mobile-first creation with quick edits and generative tools.
visualStyles: Bold social styles, stickers, effects-heavy looks.

name: Fotor
tagline: One-click style and enhancement tools.
tip: Good for quick variations rather than deep control.
sweetSpot: One-click style generation and light enhancement.
visualStyles: Photo effects, basic stylised outputs, quick variations.

name: NightCafe
tagline: An experiment hub with lots of styles/models.
tip: Explore community trends and remix workflows.
sweetSpot: Experiment hub for trying different models and styles.

name: Playground AI
tagline: Rapid exploration for drafts and iterations.
tip: Best for trying lots of prompt variations fast.
sweetSpot: Rapid exploration tool for lots of iterations and drafts.

name: Pixlr
tagline: Lightweight browser editor with gen add-ons.
tip: Good for practical, web-friendly edits.
sweetSpot: Lightweight browser editor with quick generation add-ons.
visualStyles: Simple edits and effects; practical web-friendly outputs.

name: DeepAI
tagline: Basic generator for prototypes and quick tests.
tip: Utility-first: fine for placeholders, not hero images.
sweetSpot: Basic generator useful for prototypes and quick tests.
visualStyles: Simple outputs; better for utility than wow-factor.

name: NovelAI
tagline: Strong for anime and character-focused generation.
tip: Use consistent character descriptors for repeatability.
sweetSpot: Strong pick for anime and character-focused generation.
visualStyles: Anime/manga aesthetics and consistent stylised characters.

name: Lexica
tagline: Prompt discovery and style exploration.
tip: Use it to find prompt patterns that work reliably.
sweetSpot: Great for prompt discovery and quick style exploration.

name: OpenArt
tagline: Community-driven model discovery and creation.
tip: Try different community models for niche styles.

name: Flux Schnell
tagline: Fast generations with strong quality for its speed.
tip: Great when you need lots of drafts quickly.
